verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// Good News this Lord sacrificed for your life
for your eternal salvation //

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He loved you, saved you
Sultan Lord, Sultan Lord
He loved you, saved you
Powerful King, powerful King

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
// I praise him with all my strength
I praise, I praise //
‍Halle‍lujah, hal‍lelujah
‍Halle‍lujah, hal‍lelujah
